scenario_text.value: Do your best, Floramon!
Yeah, we’ll show him just what we can do!
Idiots! You’ve got nothing to show me!

Didn’t you know? Our mutual understanding
makes us all stronger!

We figured it out! We’re different, even from
who we were yesterday!

Didn’t you know? The more time we spend
together, the stronger our bond becomes!

We’re different today than yesterday. I grow
stronger to protect Saki!

It’s the depth of our bond. I can do anything
to protect her!

You can tell just by looking at Takuma and
Agumon. The bonds strengthen our hearts!
Do your best, Vegimon!
Yeah, we’ll show him just what we can do!
Idiots! You’ve got nothing to show me!

Didn’t you know? We can get stronger by
understanding each other!

We hashed everything out. We’re not the
people we were yesterday!

Didn’t you know? The more time we spend
together, the stronger our bond becomes!

We’re not the same people we were yesterday.
I’ll get as strong as I need to protect Saki!

That’s the depth of our bond. I’ll do
anything it takes to protect her!

You can tell just by looking at Takuma and
Agumon. The bonds strengthen our hearts!
Do your best, Blossomon!
Yeah, we’ll show him just what we can do!
Idiots! You’ve got nothing to show me!

We talked over so many things. We learned
about each other, and grew stronger for it!

We hashed everything out. We’re not the
people we were yesterday!

Didn’t you know? The more time we spend
together, the stronger our bond becomes!

We’re not the same people we were yesterday.
I’ll get as strong as I need to protect Saki!

That’s the depth of our bond. I’ll do
anything it takes to protect her!

You can tell just by looking at Takuma and
Agumon. The bonds strengthen our hearts!

What garbage! If you think I will be
defeated...
